SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_ACTION_SPECIFIC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Load package parameters :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
! Add read timeout, connection timeout and x-ms-version to java arguments : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-readtimeout") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_NXS_READ_TIMEOUT#")
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-connectiontimeout") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_NXS_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#")
